title: Svalbard Polar Bears Are Getting Fatter (for Now), Study Finds
summary_full: Seals favored by Svalbard bears are becoming easier to hunt as ice declines, a study found. But researchers say the situation may be temporary.
summary_public: Seals favored by Svalbard bears are becoming easier to hunt as ice declines, a study found. But researchers say the situation may be temporary.
